Title: Who's Lucky Now?
Writer: Michael Connelly (based on the novels by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (developed for television by), Tom Smuts (written for television by), Joe Gonzalez (story editor), Tom Bernardo (staff writer), Chris Wu (script coordinator)
Actors: Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Sarah Clarke
Plot: Bosch nabs a murder suspect, while others keep a close eye on the investigation. After an encounter with Vegas mob boss, Joey Marks, Bosch faces questions about the past of someone close to...
